plain: Based on the user's favorite movies, it can be inferred that their favorite genre is science fiction/fantasy, their favorite plot is character-driven, their favorite musical score is epic and dramatic, their favorite mood for the musical score is serious, their favorite setting is outer space or a fictional world, their favorite visual style is cinematic and immersive, their favorite writing style is character-focused and dialogue-driven, their favorite runtime is around 2 hours, and their favorite themes are identity, loss, and redemption.
